name: online-shop
description: In this project the front-end section is created with **HTML,CSS, Browser-side JavaScript**.  The back-end section is created with **Node.js, Express.js**. The database is created with **Mongo DB**. There will two types of users. One is admin and other is customer.  Admin can add, delete, update products. Customer can view products, add to cart, checkout.
author: Abdullah Al Abid
